wikipedia_page.main:
Charles William Flood (18 July 1896 – 14 November 1978) was an English footballer.
Flood played for Plymouth Argyle, Hull City, Bolton Wanderers, Nottingham Forest, York City and Swindon Town.

response: * 14 November 1978 - Charlie Flood, 82, scored 68 league goals as a forward during the 1920s for Hull City, Bolton Wanderers, Nottingham Forest, York City and Swindon Town.
